title: Zac Efron sends shares topless sauna photo on Instagram
text:
He's no stranger to sending temperatures soaring when he posts pictures on social media.

But Zac Efron took things to new heights on Monday when he posed shirtless with a sultry look in a sauna.

The 32-year-old actor rocked his platinum blonde tresses all while catching the attention of some who were taken aback by the placement of his phallic shaped drawstring.

Scroll down for video

Relaxation: Zac Efron sent temperatures soaring on Monday when he stripped down to just a pair of white board-shorts to spend some time relaxing in a sauna

Zac captioned the steamy shot with a prayer sign while tagging the sauna brand.

The actor rocked a pair of white shorts that had a black drawstring that was placed in a compromising position.

'this followed by an ocean dip has you feelin 100,' commented Zac's brother, Dylan.

Co-incident? The 32-year-old rocked his platinum blonde tresses all while catching the attention of some who were taken aback by the placement of his phallic shaped drawstring

While Dylan had a one-straight mind, others' eyes went straight to the drawstring.

'I had to do a quick little double take and zoomed in on this picture.'

Zac has always continued to live a fit and healthy lifestyle but really stepped up his training for his role in the 2017 movie, Baywatch.

Movie ready: Zac has always continued to live a fit and healthy lifestyle but really stepped up his training for his role in the 2017 movie, Baywatch

Ripped! According to his trainer, Patrick Murphy, after 12 weeks of training his body-fat percentage was a low 5%

According to his trainer, Patrick Murphy, after 12 weeks of training his body-fat percentage was a low 5%.

'Efron’s Baywatch movie training program involved an ever-changing approach, involving full-body workouts, two-day splits, three-day splits, power training, strength training, stability and balance training, lifeguard training, hiking, biking, obstacle course training, and more,' the trainer told Healthline.

As for his diet, he stuck to a nutritious meal plan focusing on only whole foods and nothing highly refined or processed.

Patrick dished that he was able to eat; brown rice; but not brown rice pasta, quinoa; but no quinoa crackers, apples; but no apple juice.

Zac took to Instagram at the time to share photos and videos from his intense workout regime.

'Back and bi's #baywatch --- Training 5 days a week with my specialized super setting technique, accompanied by super duper clean eating, week after week, yields nothing short of insane results,' he wrote at the time in February 2016.

'The #Baywatch movie prep is a complete success and we still have more time for training.'
